title: 09/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin is skeptical of one team in the NFC that everyone seems to be putting into the Super Bowl. He reacts to an article that labeled Baker Mayfield as the most underrated QB in the NFL and argues this is completely wrong based on what we’ve seen from Mayfield in his career. He also has his Herd Hierarchy before the NFL season kicks off on Thursday. Plus, Cousin Sal from FOX Bet Live joins the show to give his best bets for the 2021 NFL season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
